messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_weekly_wins_2025_11_07",
      "name": "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-07T14:20:00-05:00",
      "content": "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)
Owner: Alex Smith (PM)
Project: MOB – Mobile App Launch
Week ending: 2025-11-07

Summary
This week we saw solid improvements on both performance and early user metrics as we get closer to the Mobile App Launch.

Key Wins
1) Performance improvements
- The latest round of optimizations to startup paths and network calls reduced end-to-end app launch time by approximately 15% versus last week’s build.
- This improvement is consistent across the majority of our test devices (Android and iOS), with a noticeable reduction in time-to-first-interaction.

2) Early user growth
- Our beta tester base grew by about 10% week-over-week after we opened up additional invite codes.
- Engagement from the expanded cohort has remained healthy; no drop-off in daily active testers so far.

3) Readiness for upcoming launch milestones
- The performance gains and steady beta growth put us in a better position going into the Planning and Development milestones for the Mobile App Launch.

Next Steps
- Continue to monitor performance as new features are integrated.
- Prepare a more detailed breakdown of performance and user metrics for the broader stakeholder review next week."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_weekly_wins_2025_11_07_notes",
      "name": "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Nov 3) – Draft Notes",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-07T12:40:00-05:00",
      "content": "Draft notes for: "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)"
Owner: Alex Smith

Purpose
- Capture raw bullets for the PM weekly summary before polishing the final "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)" doc.

Performance bullets (to refine)
- Jordan’s optimizations: cold start down ~14–15% on Android beta build vs last week baseline.
- iOS: similar ~15% improvement in median app launch time.
- Mention consistency across majority of test devices + improved time-to-first-interaction.

User growth bullets (to refine)
- Early beta cohort: active testers up ~9–10% WoW after expanding invite list.
- No visible drop in DAUs among existing testers.

Misc
- Tie these wins to upcoming Planning / Development milestones for Mobile App Launch (MOB-100 done, MOB-101 in progress).
- Final summary will live in main doc: "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)" and be referenced in the Friday email."
    },
    {
      "id": "sheet_mob_metrics_2025_11_07",
      "name": "MOB – Performance & Beta Metrics – Week of Nov 3",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-07T13:55:00-05:00",
      "content": "Sheet: MOB – Performance & Beta Metrics – Week of Nov 3
Owner: Alex Smith

Tabs:
1) Performance
- Columns: Platform, Metric, Baseline (prev week), Current (week of Nov 3), Delta %, Notes
- Sample rows:
  - Android, Cold start (P50), 2.1s, 1.8s, -14.3%, "Post-optimization build deployed to beta on 11/4; work by Jordan (MOB-101)."
  - iOS, Cold start (P50), 2.0s, 1.7s, -15.0%, "Similar optimizations applied; further tuning planned."

2) Beta Cohort
- Columns: Date, Active Testers, WoW %, Notes
- Sample rows:
  - 2025-10-31, 1,000, —, "Baseline before invite expansion."
  - 2025-11-07, 1,100, +10.0%, "Additional invite codes distributed; engagement stable."

3) Summary for PM Weekly
- Short bullets used to populate the doc "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)" and the email "[MOB] Weekly Wins – Performance & Beta User Growth (week of Nov 3)".
- Emphasizes ~15% performance improvement and ~10% beta user growth as key talking points."
    },
    {
      "id": "deck_mob_weekly_wins_2025_11_07",
      "name": "MOB – Weekly Wins – Stakeholder Slides (Week of Nov 3)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.presentation",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-07T15:10:00-05:00",
      "content": "Slide deck: MOB – Weekly Wins – Stakeholder Slides (Week of Nov 3)
Owner: Alex Smith

Slide 1 – Title
- "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)"
- Based on metrics from sheet "MOB – Performance & Beta Metrics – Week of Nov 3".

Slide 2 – Performance
- Bullet: "~15% reduction in app startup time vs last week’s baseline (Android & iOS)."
- Callout: "Thanks to optimizations implemented under MOB-101."

Slide 3 – User Growth
- Bullet: "~10% week-over-week increase in active beta testers after expanding invite codes."

Slide 4 – Looking Ahead
- Notes upcoming Planning and Development milestones for the Mobile App Launch project.
- References the detailed narrative in the doc "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)"."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_launch_planning_sync_notes_2025_11_06",
      "name": "Mobile App Launch – Planning Sync – 2025-11-06 – Notes",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-06T12:00:00-05:00",
      "content": "Mobile App Launch – Planning Sync – 2025-11-06 – Notes
Meeting: Mobile App Launch – planning sync
Date: 2025-11-06
Time: 10:30–11:15 ET
Location: Zoom
Attendees: Alex Smith (PM), Jordan Johnson (Eng), Sam Williams (Data/Prod)

Context
- 45-min working session requested by Alex to align on open planning items for MOB-100 and MOB-101 before the Planning milestone.
- Time window coordinated via email with Taylor and Slack DMs with Jordan/Sam; scheduled for 10:30–11:15 ET.

Agenda
1) Review open planning items on MOB-100 (Initial Setup) and MOB-101 (Core Feature).
2) Confirm what’s realistic to commit for the first development milestone.
3) Surface backend dependencies (auth, notifications) and risks.

Key Decisions
- MOB-100 confirmed as Done; no further action needed ahead of Planning milestone.
- MOB-101 scope for first development milestone:
  - Must-have: core feature flow, basic auth integration, push notification skeleton.
  - Nice-to-have (can slip by one sprint): advanced personalization and in-app messaging experiments.
- Jordan to finalize updated estimates for auth + notification components by EOD 2025-11-06 and update JIRA (MOB-101).
- Sam to bring refined risk notes and updated performance expectations into the next sprint planning.

Follow-Ups
- Alex to create/update the Planning milestone checklist in the "MOB – Launch Milestones & Checklists" sheet.
- Link this doc from the calendar event "Mobile App Launch – planning sync" so attendees can reference decisions later."
    },
    {
      "id": "sheet_mob_launch_milestones_checklists",
      "name": "MOB – Launch Milestones & Checklists",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-05T18:30:00-05:00",
      "content": "Sheet: MOB – Launch Milestones & Checklists
Owner: Alex Smith

Tabs:
1) Milestone Overview
- Columns: Milestone, Target Date, Status, Notes
- Rows:
  - Planning, 2025-11-10, In Progress, "Dependent on outcomes from 2025-11-06 planning sync with Jordan + Sam."
  - Development, 2025-11-20, Not Started, "Scope anchored in decisions from MOB-100/MOB-101."
  - Launch, 2025-11-30, Not Started, "Requires sign-off from Eng + PM + Marketing."

2) Planning Checklist
- Checklist items referencing the meeting:
  - "Hold Mobile App Launch – planning sync (Alex, Jordan, Sam) in morning window (10:00–12:00 ET)." – Target: 2025-11-06.
  - "Confirm MOB-100 is fully Done; no blockers."
  - "Align on MOB-101 scope and dependencies (auth, notifications)."
  - "Capture notes in doc: 'Mobile App Launch – Planning Sync – 2025-11-06 – Notes'."

3) Links
- A reference table of important artifacts:
  - Type: Meeting Notes, Name: "Mobile App Launch – Planning Sync – 2025-11-06 – Notes", Link: doc_mob_launch_planning_sync_notes_2025_11_06.
  - Type: Weekly Summary, Name: "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)", Link: doc_mob_weekly_wins_2025_11_07.
  - Type: Metrics Sheet, Name: "MOB – Performance & Beta Metrics – Week of Nov 3", Link: sheet_mob_metrics_2025_11_07."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_launch_planning_brief",
      "name": "Mobile App Launch – Planning Brief",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-05T15:45:00-05:00",
      "content": "Mobile App Launch – Planning Brief
Owner: Alex Smith
Project: MOB – Mobile App Launch

Purpose
- Provide a concise overview of the upcoming Planning milestone for the Mobile App Launch.
- This brief is intended to be read ahead of the planning sync with Jordan and Sam.

Key Inputs
- JIRA issues: MOB-100 (Initial Setup – Done), MOB-101 (Core Feature – In Progress).
- Performance & beta metrics from sheet: "MOB – Performance & Beta Metrics – Week of Nov 3".

Planned Working Session
- Target: 45-min morning working session with Engineering and Data/Prod.
- Proposed window: 10:00–12:00 ET on 2025-11-06; ideal slot 10:30–11:15 ET.
- Attendees: Alex (PM), Jordan (Eng), Sam (Data/Prod). Taylor optional.
- Objective: Align on scope for MOB-101 and dependencies before sprint planning.

Expected Outputs
- Agreed feature set for the first development milestone.
- Updated estimates for backend work (auth, notifications).
- Meeting notes to be captured in a separate doc (see: "Mobile App Launch – Planning Sync – 2025-11-06 – Notes")."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_weekly_email_template",
      "name": "Template – MOB Weekly Wins Email",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-10-31T10:05:00-04:00",
      "content": "Template – MOB Weekly Wins Email
Owner: Alex Smith

Subject: [MOB] Weekly Wins – <Headline> (week of <Week Range>)

Hi all,

Sharing a quick summary of this week’s wins for the Mobile App Launch (MOB):

1) Performance improvements
- <Insert high-level performance win, referencing metrics from the current week’s sheet.>

2) User growth
- <Insert high-level user growth win, referencing beta or production metrics.>

3) Additional highlights (optional)
- <Any notable feature, quality, or process improvements.>

More detailed breakdowns should be captured in the corresponding weekly doc (e.g., "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)") and the metrics sheet.

Have a good weekend,
Alex

Notes:
- This template was used as the basis for the email "[MOB] Weekly Wins – Performance & Beta User Growth (week of Nov 3)" and the doc "Mobile App – Weekly Wins (Week of Nov 3)"."
    }
  ]
}
